benchmark_details.name: HIVMedQA
benchmark_details.overview: HIVMedQA is a benchmark designed for evaluating open-ended medical question answering in the context of HIV patient management, developed with insights from an infectious disease physician.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the performance of current LLMs in the context of curbside consults for HIV care and provide actionable insights for their future development.

data.source: Curated set of clinically relevant HIV-related questions, validated with an infectious disease physician.
data.annotation: Expert validation of the questions and gold-standard answers.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on LLM responses compared to gold-standard answers.
methodology.interpretation: Higher MedGPT scores indicate better performance in comprehension, reasoning, and medical knowledge recall.
methodology.validation: Validation of model performance through repeated evaluations across multiple question categories.
